categories: Category:Battles of the Great Sith War

nodes.text: A battle was fought in the Denon system during the Great Sith War, a conflict between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, in 3996 BBY. The two sides fought with the Republic emerging as the victors.
The battle of the Denon system makes its only appearance in The Essential Atlas. It only illustrates the battle on the galactic map rather than in prose.
